评论详情: This dress surprised me with how comfortable it is.  Vibrant color, fits true to size, flowy and overall a great Maxi dress.  Bought it for a cruise and wore it with flat sandals.  You can dress it up, or go with a casual look.  I have washed it on cold, and air dried it - it did not shrink and held up well.  I have ordered another color as well!

This was SO cute on, but the quality left a lot to be desired, especially for the price. Also worth noting: I found it to fit small. I’m normally a medium, sized up to a large and it was still a bit slim through the hips for my liking.  PROS: very cute, flowy, and flattering. Lightweight and airy for summer. Great colors and patterns.  CONS: cheap feeling fabric, almost felt like wearing plastic to me? It was also very thin and looked like the fabric was already wearing through in some spots. I would definitely question how long it would hold up.

Perfect for a baby girl shower! Love the colors and the style of this dress! Cute dolmen sleeves!  Perfect for any occasion and very comfortable! Love  it!  I weigh 160, and am 5’7”, chest 38C.. I Almost got the medium because of some of the reviews , but glad I went with the Large as suggested by Amazon. It fit perfect thru the shoulders and chest.

评论概述: Way over priced but cute print/stylr
评论详情: If you’re bigger chested, def size up. The sleeves are huge but I don’t mind that. Very over priced for the quality but keeping it for a cute print resort trip.

It's perfect for pregnancy mom, or someone hiding their body. It looks real classy on me. I had the perfect sandals for it. True to size. You can size down if you want it fit snuggle. It's so pretty in person. Happy I bought it.
It's a totally different shade of green. Super bright. And the flowers are a super bright pink. Not at all like the images
Perfect summer dress. Material is light and dress is flowy so I have yet to really sweat in it
I have had so many compliments on this dress it’s beautiful and it’s so fresh and light . The feel is very nice. Thinking of getting another one in a different color.
I purchased this for a vacation and it was perfect. It is fairly lightweight but the quality is good. It was perfect for a nicer dinner at the resort.
Love this dress, it is so comfy and I love the color. It was perfect wearing it during my trip to Europe.
Love this dress! I wore it for one of my baby showers and for a few things after. Super cute and love the material, not cheap feeling at all. Great buy!
Love the material and it fits true to size.  It looks great on and washes up well.  I would definitely recommend this.
I love this dress! I haven't worn it outside yet, too cold but its flattering and prett!

评论用户: The dress was delivered super fast but the color shown was not the color delivered, this one shows a purple center the one they sent is blue and red not so nice
评论详情: Sending it back I  do not like the color not even close to what's on line
Fabric is good, loose and very comfortable, looks mostly like the picture

The fabric is really lovely, although it is poly it feels cool because it flows so nicely.  It looks and feels like very expensive fabric. It falls and moves like a dream, a great design for the summer. Can’t wait to take it on my cruise to Hawaii.
Love it so much...ordered in different patterns
Very comfy dress. Quality is good. It’s little long for me, I have to hem it about two inches from the bottom to make it my exact size.
Ordered medium - fits more like a Large or XL.  There was no tag what so ever on the dress.  I am returning.
Beautiful Colors and loved the design . It’s very comfortable and true to the size

评论概述: Oof. Little house on the prairie.
评论详情: I returned this dress.  I wanted to like it so much but I just look like I belong on “little house on the prairie.”  Jealous that some people look so cute in this type of dress, but it’s definitely not for me.
Absolutely beautiful dress! Perfect fit and great quality. I couldn’t be happier with my purchase!

This is a beautiful dress and very soft and flattering but when I went to iron it to wear it for the first time I noticed it had a hole in it. Looks like it was cut!! Return window had passed so unfortunately I’m stuck.
My mom ordered this for a baby shower and it’s very trendy and cute! Good quality not see thru at all!
Material is thin and the seams tightened after washing. I couldn't wear it again.

评论概述: Love this dress! Have it in 2 colors!
评论详情: Love this dress! Have it in 2 colors! I have it in colors = A Pink 18 and A Blue 06. I tried a few other colors too but didn't like them. They weren't quite as pictured. I wanted to like them but the patters and/or colors were off. I will say, the material is kinda gross, cheap, like a plastic parachute. But I've tried a few more expensive versions and they're either way too much fabric or something else is off. So even though the fabric feels cheap and like plastic, I really love these and get complements each time I wear them, so I do highly recommend!

评论概述: Lovely Design, But Disappointing Fabric Quality
评论详情: The print and tailoring of the dress are very nice. I didn't like the quality of the fabric; it feels like it has too much polyester and isn't fresh at all.

评论概述: So perfect and comfortable for work! Great transition into fall:)
评论详情: So perfect and comfortable for work! Great transition into fall:) Bright pink, wearing size small!
The dress didn’t fit quite right and made me look bigger than I am.

5’3 135-140 Fabulous flowy dress. Nothing clingy. Lightweight material but not flimsy. Washed well.  Vibrant color. Wore all summer and got numerous compliments each time. I am planning to revisit this shop next summer and purchase a couple more. You can dress this up or down. I think I bought a medium? It was loose but appreciated that in a hot summer.
Every time I wear this dress ( at least once a a week all summer) I get compliments.  The fabric is great.  Wash and either hang dry or cool dryer and it never wrinkled.  It is perfect for traveling.
Could size down in this dress, over thinner fabric but great for hot summer day

评论概述: Too short, too tight, just nor right
评论详情: I ordered the recommended size of large—the dress was just too small overall.
I get more compliments on this than anything I've ever worn

评论概述: WAY better than I expected from a dress on amazon!
评论详情: Ya'll.  I love this dress.  The print is vibrant, the fit is great, it's so comfortable and flowy!!  It's easy to wear and doesn't look sloppy!  I love it so much!
Very comfortable and flowy kind of dress. Good for summer or fall.

I had ordered a different dress and the same dress collection and it’s really cute. Material was flowing thin and not super hot when I got this one. It is a different material. It is hot and I felt like I was about 50 pounds heavier than I really was… So I did return it Size medium, and it felt like an extra large

I bought Blue 10 and it is made of a cotton-like material. I liked it so well, I ordered the Blue Iris 21.  This material is more like a rayon, and though lightweight, it isn’t very breathable and doesn’t feel as good, so I’m disappointed.  Both are well-made and beautiful in color.  They are loose-fitting.  I snipped the sleeve elastic and took a couple stitches at the lower neckline.  They do take awhile to get.
Fits true to size
Like it
Well made & high quality. It looks fantastic! Very comfortable.

评论概述: Cute, lightweight, free people or anthropology inspired
评论详情: This dress is extremely comfortable! I think it would be perfect as a dress for church, maternity dress, or a casual house dress. Definitely needs to be accessorized correctly.

Dress was huge! I expected big and loose, but not this. Bust fit great (casual loose) byt then huge. Print was fun, material seems quality and would hold up. I would order from company again, if I could find shirt.

This dress fits so well is so comfortable. Looks good no matter if you’re out shopping or if you’re going to work, the quality is really great. It washes really well doesn’t wrinkle. It’s just fantastic.
This dress did not fit as described.  It was a terrible dress and I was extremely disappointed.

I love this dress so much but wish it were better quality. The fabric is very thin and the stitching is already coming out. Runs big. I’m petite and sized down to a small. It fits well and still has an oversized look though the bust area has no give.

评论概述: Love the fit, style and pattern
评论详情: Finally a dress I don't have to return!

评论概述: Cute dress! But not breathable and different prints = different fabrics
评论详情: I'm 205 lbs, 5'4" and bought XL. I got this dress in three prints and will likely keep two. The style is cute and fit is good though the fabric is pretty cheap and not at all breathable. I will also note that 2 of the 3 prints I got were made of very thin fabric while the third was a slightly thicker but still thin fabric. I was happier with the fall and movement of the thicker fabric but both are fine.  At the end of the day, this feels like a $30/$35 dress rather than $40+.
Poor quality. Very thin, cheap material. See through!

I purchased the green rose print and the pink small floral print both in size small.  Fits & hangs nicely.  Love the green rose print & like the pink print, but my husband thinks the pink print is “frumpy” so I’m returning that one.  Would love it if the dress had pockets, but it doesn’t.
It’s light weight, lose fitting, Free People/ bohemian style yet very flattering to the figure.
Awful cheap fabric feels like a plastic table cloth absolutely awful DO NOT RECOMMEND.

评论概述: This dress give get you all the compliments!
评论详情: This dress is amazing! I originally ordered a medium since all of the reviews had said it was oversized. I did end up sending the medium back and ordering my TTS large (170 pounds). My bottom half is curvier and I wanted it to fit looser on the bottom to give a flowing look. The large fit amazing it was so stunning on. I got several compliments.
Exactly what I was hoping for. Love everything about it. Very forgiving…great for any body type!

I just received this dress and it is a gorgeous dress. The quality is spot on and the fit as expected. I have to send it back, the style just did not work for me. I wish it did, it really is a beautiful dress.
This dress can be worn for around the house when barefoot, casual/dress with sandals, and dressier with heels. Love it!
Such a cute and soft dress. I am 5’4 and between 155-160 pound, I ordered a size medium. It’s a little big but I think that’s way it’s suppose to fit. Would go great with sneakers or flats.
The pattern is so colorful, bright and fun!  I love the style it's so beautiful on and stylish on.. Buy it and thank me later

Darling summer dress. Loved the vibrant colors. I typically wear a size M, and so ordered a Med. Fit was loose, but not baggy. Lengthwise, I'm 5'7 and it comes down to mid-calf, which is just perfect. It has been through the wash once, and held up great. (I always hang dry). I could not be happier with this purchase. The only negative is that the fabric doesn't really breathe, so although it is light & loose it can be a little sweaty.
This dress is really cute and comfortable! Definitely going to be buying more colors.
Only thing a little negative is the sleeves aren't as puffy as in the pictures.
I love this dress.  So pretty, comfy and perfect price.  Lots of color options. Wore it on a girls trip and all the ladies bought one.  Highly recommend.

评论概述: Slick, Onion Paper Thin, Polyester Fabric
评论详情: Loved the colors in the dress and style of the dress. A tad long on this 5/5" body. The worst part is the slick, onion paper thin polyester fabric of which this dress is made. When I put it on, it was like putting on a plastic bag. This one is going back to the seller. Why not make stuff out of Rayon vs. everything out of Polyester? So much more comfortable.
The dress is cool and comfortable. I like the color and the fit.

评论概述: Do not buy ! It's made of napkins
评论详情: CHEAP! CHEAP! CHEAP! The dress looks nothing like the photo. I am convinced the fabric is literally Paper Napkins ! it is so thin you can see through the whole dress. The threading was already coming out when I opened it , and it runs small. The look is NOT BOHO ! The dress looks and feels like a cheap , flimsy Halloween costume for a child. Very disappointed. Not worth the money at all. I sent it back immediately.  -5 STARS
Beautiful dress with good true to size fit.
Material is awful. Poorly sewn. Not really empire waist - not fitted well. It's more like a mu-mu.  Returning this.

I love this dress. I like the fabric in that it is cool and breezy and doesn't wrinkle in the hot weather. I have worn this several times and EVERY single time I am asked where I purchased this dress. It's great to throw on for quick errands in the summer heat or easy to dress it up a notch for a date night. I recommend this dress.

评论概述: It's a muumuu! Only for extra skinny ladies.
评论详情: I bought a few of these because the pictures were so cute. It looked amazing on ladies in the reviews - all shorter and skinner than me. I am only about 20 lbs. or so overweight, so I'm still within "normal". I am 5'11". This dress hit me mid-calf. Any curves were accentuated and not in a good way. This is a literal muumuu, just with lightweight fabric.  If you are straight as a board, awesome.  If you have any unsightly curves, I do not recommend.

评论概述: Easy to launder and loose fitting for our hot summers
评论详情: Pretty and feminine.  flowy
The print looked kind of cheap and the dress was super loose and baggy. This might be just what you are looking for, but I found it too big

评论概述: Elastic broke after a couple of wearings
评论详情: The elastic in the sleeve broke after I wore it only a couple times. I love the style of this dress but I’m so disappointed that it broke. I’m past the return window so I’m stuck. 😕
I absolutely love the print and style of this dress. Unfortunately it ripped in the seams after the second time I wore it. Not great quality at all.
Looks like the photo! Fits nice.
Tags were removed from dress possibly worn. I returned ask for new dress to be sent .

These are flattering dresses. They are quality material with great vibrant patterns.  They are cool and comfortable for summer and look great. Easy to dress up or down.  Love it and have 3 different colors!
Perfect fit and sooooo comfy!!! Perfect for teaching.
Fits like a tent.
Fits well very pretty pattern but no pockets! Just saw that and missed the return

Yes, it is made of polyester and, therefore, the fabric does not “breathe”; however, the dress will travel well, because the wrinkles are minimum and likely not very visible for (probably) most of the prints. I LOVE the multi print version I chose!  I opted to trim 3 inches off the length (thank goodness I know how to sew) for a more of a midi length for my height. Also, this dress in unlined, so I I will wear a half slip with it.
It's light and bright and fun to wear.

评论概述: Beautiful dress, but not floor-length for me
评论详情: I have thick ankles and need a dress that is long enough to hide them. This dress actually draws attention to them, as it ends mid-calf for me (5'6" size medium dress.) Everything else about this dress is exactly what I wanted, alas.

This dress is everything!!!! Dress it up or down. It is so easy to throw on and go. You could wear it as a maternity dress as well. I love the many patterns and colors you can buy it in. I’m have the blue diamond one, but I want so many others too! So many dresses so little time!

This is the dress for you if you are a teacher. So comfy and cute, looks professional. It is wrinkly at first but they kind of come out with wear. Want in every color! Looks professional yet so comfortable. Highly recommend :)

I bought this dress to have something that would be easy to put on and off after having surgery and it was a great choice. It’s super easy to just drop it over my head or to pull it off when the time comes. It’s also cute.!  The cut is very roomy and the sleeves are elbow length on me, but I have pretty long arms so if you’re just average height, they will be to the forearm on you. I’m 5 foot 10 and the dress hits me about at the lowest part of my calf.  I’ve got the green and white print and it’s a very pretty color not too bright or neon —this would be the perfect dress for summer if it were in a cotton fabric instead of the man-made stuff.
This dress is so light weight and soft, it’s perfect for summer. I wouldn’t wear this in winter, material wouldn't be warm enough. Exactly what I was looking for!

I bought this dress a year ago and love it! I decided to buy another color and then changed the fabric. It used to be a nice lightweight cotton and now it’s a cheap scratchy polyester. So disappointing. If you see a high review from a bit back it might not apply anymore.
This looks awful on me. It’s too short for my 5’10 body hitting me just under my calves. The material is paper thin. I don’t think the quality meets the price point at all. It’s going back.
The color is pretty. The size is good. It is very comfortable and cute!
This is not at all like pictured. The fabric is super cheap.
Colorful lightweight fabric. True to size.

This dress is really cute and I liked the fabric when it arrived.  However, upon the first wash it faded.  2nd wash and it looks really old.  I ordered another print from this same company and it was a different fabric that washes very well.  Not sure why this one is a different fabric.  In any event, it is not going to hold up much longer.  I would not recommend this pattern due to the fabric not holding up.
I had to return because it was the wrong size. But was beautiful
I love this dress. I’ve received many compliments each time I wear the dress. It is nice and light, perfect for packing and wearing in the hot summer.
I love how this dress looks, but I returned it. The top part of the dress was odd. It was almost like it was sewn wrong.

I bought the green dress with pink flowers and the red one with flower shapes. Both were great. The green one fit looser in the chest area which I liked. They are different materials as well. It was comfortable enough to wear on a plane and cute enough for church. I may buy a third one.
Dress was true to size but was not as described in reviews.  The neckline was not lined as shown or described. Cheaply sewn.
Order size up just in case

The colors are so fun and I got lots of compliments when I wore it. However, it isn’t lined and feels very cheap! It does look cute on but it is thin. I kept it, but just be aware that it is not high quality and won’t last forever.

评论概述: The material was not as described, or as the prior dress I ordered
评论详情: The first dress I ordered up this style was a soft, and flowing material. I ordered two more dresses because I love the dress. The two dresses that  were delivered recently were not made of the same material as the first dress I ordered. The material was shiny and felt like a stiffer  polyester and not soft and flowing as the first one. Very disappointed. I am returning them.
